self = <FgAI.test_001.test_DossierU.TestDossierUpload object at 0x000002394051AD00>

    @allure.story("卷宗上传")
    @allure.title("上传ZIP格式卷宗文件")
    def test_01_upload_zip_file(self):
        """测试上传ZIP格式的卷宗文件"""
        try:
            logger.info("开始ZIP文件上传测试")
            with allure.step("点击上传zip按钮"):
                # 等待按钮可见和可点击
                upload_zip_button = self.wait.until(EC.element_to_be_clickable((
                    By.XPATH,
                    "//div[contains(@class, 'tree-button-group')]//button[contains(text(), 'ZIP')]"
                )))
                upload_zip_button.click()
                time.sleep(1)
    
            with allure.step("选择并上传ZIP文件"):
                zip_path = self._get_test_file_path('(2024)鲁0502民初374号.zip')
                assert os.path.exists(zip_path), "ZIP测试文件不存在"
                self._upload_file(zip_path, "zip")
    
            logger.info("ZIP文件上传成功")
            allure.attach(
                self.driver.get_screenshot_as_png(),
                name="zip_upload_success",
                attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG
            )
    
        except Exception as e:
            logger.error(f"ZIP文件上传测试失败: {str(e)}")
            allure.attach(
>               self.driver.get_screenshot_as_png(),
                name="zip_upload_failed",
                attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG
            )
